page.title: 17Caffyn Parsons Garden Centre
page.content: The Caffyn_Parsons{Garden Centre}is situated on the Badshot Lea Road between Aldershot and Farnham and occupies{10 acres}of land. Mr. Caffyn_Parsons opened the centre in 1979. He employs 20 people full time, 14 part time, and 10{weekend workers.} He decided to develop this site because its in a good position and he was afraid of competition if he did not.Mr.Caffyn-Parsons plans for the future include early retirement and an increase in wages. The most expensive single items sold are{swimming pools}at Â£20,000 and lawnmowers at Â£3,000.Garden furniture and plastic ducks are new lines that have sold surprisingly well. Other items sold include fish ponds,bird tables, greenhouses,wheel barrows and {plants. } .
